CustomField.description: This formula is used by the filters in the nightly Work Order generation batch to decide whether work orders should be regenerated or updated. Please do not change the formula
CustomField.formula: TEXT( Status ) ='New' || TEXT( Status ) ='Scheduled' || TEXT( Status ) ='Dispatched'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula is used by the filters in the nightly Work Order generation batch to decide whether work orders should be regenerated or updated. Please do not change the formula
CustomField.label: IsValidForUpdate
